meanings.definition: A physical exercise that involves a squat, a push-up, and a jump.
meanings.sent1: I did ten burpees during my workout.
meanings.sent2: Burpees are a great way to work multiple muscle groups.
meanings.sent3: After a few burpees, I felt like I was ready to take on the world!
meanings.sent4: The burpees were like a dance of strength and agility.
meanings.sent5: The instructor demonstrated the proper form for burpees.

meanings.definition: To perform a series of burpees as a form of exercise.
meanings.sent1: Let's burpees together for a fun workout!
meanings.sent2: I burpees every morning to stay fit.
meanings.sent3: He burpees so energetically that it's contagious!
meanings.sent4: She burpees her way to a healthier lifestyle.
meanings.sent5: Burpees can really get your heart pumping!
